title: Zhang Weili Beats Carla Esparza to Become the Women’s 115-pound U.F.C. Champion Again
description: Zhang regained the women’s strawweight championship that she had previously lost.
dc:creator: Kris Rhim

media:content.media:description: Zhang Weili cartwheeled around the octagon after defeating Carla Esparza for a U.F.C. title.
